eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: San Luis Obispo, CA; AT 11:46 AM ON NOV 06, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:46 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the required monthly test of the San Luis Obispo County Emergency Alert System.  Repeating, this is only a test.  This test is coming to you from the San Luis Obispo County Emergency Operations Center.  This concludes the required monthly test.
